title: An In-Depth Look At The U.S. Cyber War, The Military Alliance And Its Pitfalls
teaser: In the book @War, Shane Harris reports that U.S. intelligence agencies, sometimes aided by corporations, are trying to dominate cyberspace. It's "changing the Internet in fundamental ways," he says.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
